Dialogue.Page: Crashes: 30 (It's fun hearing the brittle crust crack)
Woah. What are these weird lil' crystals? They're making me stick to the wall..
Guess they must play with gravity somehow? Man, the Nomai had some sweet tech!
I should try bring one home to Timber Hearth! Uh, if that's even.. possible.
Bet it'd make a pretty neat exhibit in Hornfels' new museum.
And if Slate could install one of these in the ship, it'd probably help out a ton with spacesickness in the ship, too.
If it works out, maybe I could finally fly that lil' hatchling who's afraid of space to see the ruins on this planet at last!
